reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Federation of Ethiopian National Associations of Persons with Disabilities

description.narrative: - Provide organizational support to FENAPD and member DPOs basic business skills training for 28 women and 28 youth with disabilities each and start-up capital provision of basic business skills training for 14 mothers(care givers) having children with dis abilities including start up capital.- To enhance the empowerment of the disability movement and promotion of disability inclusive development in the country.-Outcomes are improvement of organizational capacity of FENAPD and member DPOs basic business skil l training and start up capital for 70 youth and women with disabilities and enable them generate income.- The direct beneficiaries are 160 persons with disabilities and the general public-Co actors are Bureau of Labor and Social Affairs Bureau women + chi ldren affairs Bureau of Small + medium enterprises. The implementing partner will be FENAPD. It was chosen as it is an umbrella organization for many disability organizations in Ethiopia. Web: www.fenapd.org
